title: Axel's Anchor
description: Axel Bryant has lived a charmed life. Growing up in the shadow of his father, he is determined to make a name for himself. After losing a drumming competition, Axel returns home to make it big. Bella Armstrong grew up on the wrong side of the tracks. With the cards stacked against her and dreams of becoming a prima ballerina, Bella has no room in her life for distractions. When these two meet, will they be able to follow their hearts and make beautiful music together?
author: E.S. McMillan
